paragraphs.content: Then Judas, who had betrayed him, when he saw that he was condemned, repented himself, and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders,
paragraphs.contentHtml: Then Judas, who had betrayed him, when he saw that he was condemned, repented himself, and brought again the thirty pieces of silver to the chief priests and elders,

paragraphs.content: Saying, I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Saying, I have sinned in that I have betrayed the innocent blood.

paragraphs.content: And they said unto him, What is that to us? See thou to it; thy sins be upon thee.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And they said unto him, What is that to us? See thou to it; thy sins be upon thee.

paragraphs.content: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple, and departed, and went, and hanged himself on a tree. And straightway he fell down, and his bowels gushed out, and he died.
paragraphs.contentHtml: And he cast down the pieces of silver in the temple, and departed, and went, and hanged himself on a tree. And straightway he fell down, and his bowels gushed out, and he died.
